and.attribute: This position reports to the Site Manager of ARINC Vietnam and duties include but are not limited to the following: • Works closely with Site Manager to learn, to assist, and to be able to carry out systems administration/operational/documentation duties • Provides a broad range of backup services to the Site Manager including serving as a stand-in when required • Act as a liaison between local team, customers and ARINC Support Team • Act as a point of contact with airlines and is responsible for proper communication in case of system related issues e.g. software troubleshooting • Successful candidate is responsible for oversight and management of the airport systems that may be deployed at the site. • He/She has to administer these systems, ensuring system availability to airport customers on a 24/7 basis while meeting strict service level agreements in accordance with the contract with the customer • Candidate will supervise a team of technical staff (sub-contract) to ensure efficient operation of the site • He/She will develop and deliver required inventory, maintenance, management reports, and take on any task/project assigned by the manager when required • Candidate is also expected to liaise with third party software and hardware vendors for system related issues and hardware related issues respectively, including arranging the shipping of defective equipment to equipment manufacturers for repair • Candidate is expected to be on-call for responding to any system faults and provide hands-on system troubleshooting of the systems

• Typically is qualified at levels equal to or above MCSE or CCNA and has minimum of 5 years’ experience in Airport Information System as well as work experience in installation, configuration, maintenance, and troubleshooting of Windows workstations, servers. • Strong communication skill sets in English and Vietnamese • Experience with LAN/WAN protocols, communications, specialized peripheral equipment applications and utilization methods • Also be familiar in the implementation and support of networked Windows workstations on a medium to large sized Windows 2012 server platforms, systems administration, and customer service/training. • Proven track records in supervision/management as well as developing and maintaining management reports and budgetary responsibilities • Hold strong knowledge of VMware, Advance Server with cluster, Windows 7 desktop, SQL Server, Oracle Database, IIS, Domain Controller, airlines Terminal Emulator /DCS application.
